Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/26/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1986, off Kevin Gross (PHI)...

7/5/1990: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $300,000 per year, for 2 years.
